author: CMS Collaboration

short_description.content: As the experiments at the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) brace for the start of Run 3 of the acceleratorâ€™s programme in 2022, the CMS collaboration has released a new batch of research-quality open data recorded by the CMS detector in 2015, the first year of Run 2. The new datasets are now available on the CERN Open Data portal.

title: First CMS open data from LHC Run 2 released
